tswitem.name: Signet of Karma
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Karma
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you directly heal an ally, you have a 25% chance to heal yourself for 15%/30%/45% of the heal amount. This Signet can be attached to Head Talismans or Weapons. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
